examples.example: 和大家一起努力奋斗的日子让我很有感觉，充满了激情与活力。

translate.english: The days of working hard together with everyone make me feel great and are full of passion and vitality.

examples.example: 看到那美丽的风景，我顿时有感觉，心情也变得格外舒畅。

translate.english: Seeing that beautiful scenery, I suddenly have a feeling, and my mood also becomes extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 每当我读到一本好书，就会对书中的世界很有感觉，仿佛自己置身其中。

translate.english: Whenever I read a good book, I will have a great feeling for the world in the book, as if I were in it myself.
